textos_fuente.text: Arcadia Municipal Golf Course – City of Arcadia City of Arcadia, Florida City Council Agendas & Minutes Council Meeting Dates News COVID-19 Departments Administration City Clerk Finance Human Resources Job Listings Community Development Code Enforcement Planning & Zoning Arcadia Airport Golf Course Public Works Streets Division Solid Waste Division Parks Division Mobile Home Park Division Cemetery Division Utilities Pay Your Utilities Bill Water Treatment Plant Division Waste Water Treatment Plant Division Water & Sewer System Division Utility Billing Division State Road and City Lighting Division Police Send an Anonymous Tip Biographies Apply for Employment Documents Residents & Visitors Pay Your Utilities Bill Directions Parks Division Events FAQ Code Enforcement Police Arcadia Municipal Golf Course Arcadia Airport – X06 COVID-19 Contact Contact Departments Contact City Council City Council Agendas & Minutes Council Meeting Dates Council Members News COVID-19 Departments Administration City Clerk General Finance Human Resources Job Listings Community Development General Code Enforcement Planning & Zoning Arcadia Airport Golf Course Public Works General Streets Division Solid Waste Division Parks Division Mobile Home Park Division Cemetery Division Utilities General Pay Your Utilities Bill Water Treatment Plant Division Waste Water Treatment Plant Division Water & Sewer System Division Utility Billing Division State Road and City Lighting Division Police General Send an Anonymous Tip Biographies Apply for Employment Documents Residents & Visitors Pay Your Utilities Bill Directions Parks Division Events FAQ Code Enforcement Police Golf Course Arcadia Airport – X06 COVID-19 Contact Contact Departments Contact City Council Home Departments Arcadia Municipal Golf Course Arcadia Municipal Golf Course The City of Arcadia Municipal Golf Course Staff welcomes you to our Pro Shop and Golf Course. Watch for updates to the website for more information on Staff and Management. We hope you enjoy your time with us and if we can assist you in any way, please ask. Check in at the Pro Shop before play. Course Details Rates Membership Tournaments Book Tee Times Arcadia Golf at its Finest The Arcadia Municipal Golf Course abides by the rules of golf published by the USGA.  League and Tournament play should be conducted in compliance with the USGA rules of play, including equipment compliance. Local rules are published on the score card. Please see Pro Shop for any clarifications. Bag storage is available on a first come basis. No bags will be stored on the floor in the bag room as it hinders floor cleaning and waxing. Any bags stored without a current storage agreement on file will be confiscated. Please have your name on your bag to assist staff in insuring your bag is in the proper bag space. Please do not keep any food items in your bag. Bag access when the Pro shop is closed will be based on staff availability. The Arcadia Municipal Golf Course is open 363 days a year from sunrise to sunset. We are closed Thanksgiving & Christmas Day. Directions ARCADIA MUNICIPAL GOLF COURSE REOPENING ARCADIA-MUNICIPAL-GOLF-COURSE-REOPENING.pdf 105.2 KB 1343 Downloads Details Author: Beth Carsten Category: City Council Date: April 30, 2020 The City of Arcadia website is undergoing modifications to provide enhanced access to documents for disabled individuals who are visually impaired and to comply with the requirements of the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) to make reasonable accommodations. If you would like to obtain a document not currently provided on the website, please contact our City Clerk, Penny Delaney, at 863-494-4114 Ext. 301 or pdelaney@arcadia-fl.gov . Thank you for your patience and understanding as we implement these changes. Florida has a very broad public records law. Most written communications, to or from local officials regarding city business, are public records available to the public and media upon request. Your email communications may be subject to public disclosure. Search This Site Contact the Golf Course Golf Course – (863) 494-4223 Director – Jeffery A. Gibson, PGA – jgibson@arcadia-fl.gov Read Jeff’s Bio Purchase Gift Card Pay Utilities Bill Online Pay Your Utilities Follow the Golf Course on Facebook Arcadia Municipal Golf Course Search for Loved Ones in the Cemetery Search For Loved Ones Follow us on Facebook The City of Arcadia, Florida Quick Links Contact Public Works Utilities City Council Parks Division Arcadia Municipal Airport – X06 Code Enforcement Police Department News Helpful Websites DART Chamber of Commerce DeSoto County Property Appraisers Municode Categories Job Listings Press Releases Upcoming Events Sep 16 6:00 pm - 8:00 pm Council Meeting Sep 24 5:01 pm - 6:00 pm 2025-26 Final Millage and Budget Public Hearing Oct 7 6:00 pm - 8:00 pm Council Meeting Oct 13 3:00 pm - 5:00 pm Historic Preservation Commission Oct 14 4:00 pm - 5:00 pm Planning & Zoning Board View Calendar Address 23 N. Arcadia Golf Course - Arcadia, CA Email Club Reservations: 626.443.9367 Book A Tee Time Course Rates Golf Course Details Rates Calendar Membership Instruction Tournaments Contact Contact Us Donations Career Opportunities Email Club Welcome to Arcadia Par 3 Golf Course The Hidden Treasure of Los Angeles Golf since 1962 Located at the base of the majestic San Gabriel Mountains just 20 minutes from downtown Los Angeles in Arcadia, California, is an 18-hole par 3 course measuring 1,947 yards, with Poa annua and bentgrass greens, and many challenging bunkers. The course and the practice facility are equipped with lights and remain open extended hours for late-night play.
